subject: Re: [RTSC] Re: This Crap is Almost what makes me give up !!!
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_2275d.2b657865.398c325c_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 
Many of these people are just sour grapes, they wish they had thought of it 
first. sf
 
 
In a message dated 8/5/2010 10:03:12 AM Eastern Standard Time, 
rmc103@... writes:

Rountree is not too bad. He is just what I term Uber-Rational.
If you can't replicate something in a lab setting, he will dismiss it.
In the absence of strong evidence, he will easily debunk things.
Rorke, on the other hand is an unprofessional boob!
I don't think that he is really a scientist, like he says he is.
He just likes to debunk WITHOUT strong evidence.
Rorke loves to bash Spiricom project.
While I believe that O'Neill MAY have been a fraud, or, at the very least, 
mentally ill, the other people involved in the project seemed to be quite 
sincere about the whole thing.
I have, so far, contacted 2 people involved with Spiricom-Hans Heckman & 
Bruce Dapkey. While they admit that O'Neill was a strange character, most of 
the folks working for Metascience really wanted the whole project to work.
I believe that most people who do GB work are also the same way. For every 
crackpot you may have many others who are serious and sincere about what 
they do. Maybe, their science backgrounds are weak, but, this stuff is an art 
more than it is a science. I think that a LOT of the paranormal is subjective 
and based on personal experiences. Its when you try to get "scientific" 
about it to prove phenomena to others is when you start to get into problems 
with methodologies and the collection/presentation of evidence.
It's VERY difficult to prove this stuff, especially, to someone who DOESN'T 
want to believe in it. Everyone is a skeptic until they have a personal 
experience.........including myself!!!!!!
I am still skeptical, but, I do leave the door open to the POSSIBILITY that 
the GB works. 
It does work...............SOMETIMES. 
Sometimes...............not so much.
Its good to try to be scientific, rational and objective. But, if you are 
TOO much like that, you may miss out on the personal, subjective and the 
fuzzy-headed stuff in life. 
Can love be proven in a lab?
Can religion be proven in a lab?
Can beauty be proven in a lab?
Maybe, beauty can be to a certain degree, but, you get my point.
Trying to PROVE that spirits are talking to you through broken radios is 
like trying to prove that baby pigeons exist!!!!!!
Have you ever seen a baby pigeon?????
Neither have I.
But, whenever I go to NY city, I am inundated with friggin' 
pigeons!!!!!!!!!! 
--- In _mailto:RTSC%40yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:RTSC@yahoogroups.com) , 
"g.guzzi" <vet7id@...> wrote:
>
> I seriously think they could have made a few good points, but whatever 
they presented that was objective and rational was negated by their arrogance 
and ignorance. The way the one clown giggled like a little girl when 
discussing Frank and Steve made me wish I was with him at the time the recording 
was made...to correct him a little. 
> 
> They clearly lack experience with frequency sweep investigations. And 
then they threw in all that street corner psychoanalysis nonsense. 
> 
> Further proof the are not as smart as they think..near the end, 
suggesting some folks don't like them and might want to do bad things to them, they 
both said they carry guns...thereby taking away the advantage in doing that. 
> 
> So forget those two obnoxious punks. I doubt they impressed many people.
> 
> Jim C.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In _mailto:RTSC%40yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:RTSC@yahoogroups.com) , 
Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@> wrote:
> >
> > These bozos are so ignorant, and brain dead that they can't make a name 
for
> > themselves, so they have to find sometheing they think they can attack 
and
> > get away with. Ya have to ignore the loooooooosers. If we didn't have
> > something that worked you would never hear a peep out of the scidorks.
> > 
> > I don't go after them cuz they are so freaking pathetic, I always feel
> > guitly beating up the retards. They accept no evidence, they test 
nothing
> > themselves, they just name call and bully, and have nothing to stand on.
> > Their version of science is just another goofy religion.
> > 
> > Not going to matter....
> > F-S
> > On Sun, Jul 25, 2010 at 3:07 PM, Urkel23 <urkel23@> wrote:
> > 
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > _http://njprg.com/blog2/?p=31_ (http://njprg.com/blog2/?p=31) 
> > >
> > > A show that i had no knowledge of berading me and frank for an hour. 
At
> > > least they could have had us on to defend ourselves. Not knowing what 
we do
> > > at all, most of what they said is based on conjecture and 100% false.
> > >
> > > Listen for yourself and see. David Rountree is a huge piece of crap 
and
> > > adds nothing to any field or life for that matter. If you see a 
picture of
> > > him, you would want to punch him repeatedly.....at least that's how i 
feel.
> > >
> > > Dr. Rorke i thought was a good guy, but he's no better than the other
> > > skepdickheads.
> > >
> > > -Steve H.


--part1_2275d.2b657865.398c325c_boundary
